name: Cupuaçu Curl Cream
description:
This item can be purchased at www.kyrasultimate.com

This cream, made with cupuaçu butter and argan oil, helps to eliminate frizz and flyaways while locking in moisture to give you perfect curls. This also works great as a twisting cream.  This cream contains no harsh sulfates or silicones. Apply to damp hair over your favorite leave-in (try Kyra's Coconut Cream Conditioner). Smooth through hair and allow to air dry. To refresh second day hair spritz hair damp with water and apply Cupuaçu Curling Cream over damp hair to rejuvenate bed head curls.

Ingredients:
Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, Cupuaçu butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Avocado Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Glycerin, Palm Stearic Acid, Argan Oil, Fragrance, and Optiphen (preserved for your safety)

Scent:  Island Getaway

name: Hydrating Hemp Conditioner
description:
This item can be purchased at www.kyrasultimate.com

This luxurious conditioner is made with hydrating hemp and avocado oils and a touch of hydrolyzed oat protein to give you that perfect protein-moisture balance. Meadowfoam oil is included to give your hair long-lasting shine. This conditioner is free of harsh sulfates and parabens and is perfectly formulated for naturally curly, kinky, and relaxed hair. 

To use, apply a generous amount of conditioner to the palm of your hand, apply to wet hair, and leave in for 15 to 20 minutes. For a rich deep conditioning treatment, leave in for 30 minutes and apply a heat cap or sit under a steamer for the ultimate hydrating experience. Rinse and style as desired.

Ingredients:
Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, BTMS, Hemp Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, Meadowfoam Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Oat Protein, Fragrance, and Optiphen (preserved for your safety).

Scent:  Pineapple

name: Coconut Hair Milk
description:
This item can be purchased at www.kyrasultimate.com

Indulge your hair with this light weight moisturizing hair milk. This hair milk is made with coconut oil, jojoba oil, and a host of nurturing botanical extracts. Coconut oil is the only oil proven to penetrate the cortex of the hair, and jojoba oil is the best natural substitute for the sebum produced by our bodies. Together these oils give your hair the ultimate in moisture. This hair milk is free of harsh sulfates and parabens and is perfectly formulated for naturally curly, kinky, and relaxed hair. 

To use, apply a small amount of hair milk to clean hair and style as desired.  This hair milk works great for thin to medium textures.

Ingredients:
Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, BTMS, Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil, Chamomile Extract, Horsetail Extract, Nettle Extract, Sea Kelp Extract, Slippery Elm Extract, Fragrance, and Optiphen (preserved for your safety)

Scent:  Coconut

name: Sweet Mango Butter
description:
This item can be purchased at www.kyrasultimate.com

This creamy whipped mango butter with emu oil provides the ultimate in moisture. This multi-purpose butter absorbs quickly in both the hair and skin. Great for moisturizing dry skin patches, and perfect for sealing in moisture for your hair. If shea butter has not worked for your hair, mango butter is the perfect alternative. 

Ingredients:
Mango Butter, Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil, Castor Seed Oil, Emu Oil, Vitamin E and Fragrance

Scent:  Mango
